text: Herwald Ramsbotham GCMG, GCVO, OBE, MC, PC (6 March 1887 â€“ 30 January 1971) otherwise known as "The Viscount Solabry", was a British politician. He was a government minister between 1931 and 1941 and served as the Governor-General of Ceylon between 1949 and 1954.
